title: Logistics Coordinator
flavourtext: Working as a logistics member of the club SFU Surge, which is an all-inclusive club that connects students to the tech industry
description: Working in a small team to organize and execute large-scale events such as hackathons, career fairs, and other various events for students interested making connections with the industry

title: Academic Tutor
flavourtext: Taught international students of various backgrounds secondary level topics such as math, physics, and english
description: Working in a small team to organize and execute large-scale events such as hackathons, career fairs, and other various events for students interested making connections with the industry
